languages.text: {n}Соломон качает головой.{/n} "Он сделал, что мог, но вытащить из Глейто неизвестную друкарскую дрянь в полевых условиях не выйдет. Надо дотянуть до возвращения на флагман, иначе никак. Не знаю, выберемся ли мы, но на всякий случай я должен..."

{n}Solomorne shakes his head.{/n} "He has already done all he can, but there is no way to extract some unknown Drukhari filth out of Glaito while we're in the field. We will have to get by until we are back on the flagship, and that's that. I don't know if we will make it out of here, but in case we don't, there is something I must do..."
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон качает головой.{/n} "Он сделал, что мог, но вытащить из Глейто неизвестную друкарскую дрянь в полевых условиях не выйдет. Надо дотянуть до возвращения на флагман, иначе никак. Не знаю, выберемся ли мы, но на всякий случай я должен..."

We will have to get by until we are back on the flagship, and that's it. I don't know if we will make it out of here, but in case we don't, there is something I must do..."

We will have to get by until we are back on the flagship, and that's that. I don't know if we will make it out of here, but in case we don't, there is something I must do..."

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは首を振った。{/n}「彼にできることは、すべてやってくれました。ですが、こんな戦場のど真ん中で、正体不明のデュカーリの汚穢を、グライトから取り除く術はありません。旗艦に戻るまでは、このまま何とかやり過ごすしかない。それだけの話です。ここを生きて出られるかどうかはわかりません。ですが、もしもの時に備えて、どうしてもやっておかねばならないことがあります…」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne shakes his head.{/n} "He has already done all he can, but there is no way to extract some unknown Drukhari filth out of Glaito while we're in the field. We will have to get by until we are back on the flagship, and that's that. I don't know if we will make it out of here, but in case we don't, there is something I must do..."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは首を振った。{/n}「彼にできることは、すべてやってくれました。ですが、こんな戦場のど真ん中で、正体不明のデュカーリの汚穢を、グライトから取り除く術はありません。旗艦に戻るまでは、このまま何とかやり過ごすしかない。それだけの話です。ここを生きて出られるかどうかはわかりません。ですが、もしもの時に備えて、どうしてもやっておかねばならないことがあります…」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Er hat bereits getan, was er kann, aber solange wir im Feld sind, gibt es keine Möglichkeit, irgendeinen unbekannten Drukhari-Dreck aus Glaito zu entfernen. Wir müssen damit zurechtkommen, bis wir wieder im Flaggschiff sind. Ende. Ich weiß nicht, ob wir hier wegkommen, aber falls nicht, muss ich noch etwas erledigen ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne shakes his head.{/n} "He has already done all he can, but there is no way to extract some unknown Drukhari filth out of Glaito while we're in the field. We will have to get by until we are back on the flagship, and that's that. I don't know if we will make it out of here, but in case we don't, there is something I must do..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Er hat bereits getan, was er kann, aber solange wir im Feld sind, gibt es keine Möglichkeit, irgendeinen unbekannten Drukhari-Dreck aus Glaito zu entfernen. Wir müssen damit zurechtkommen, bis wir wieder im Flaggschiff sind. Ende. Ich weiß nicht, ob wir hier wegkommen, aber falls nicht, muss ich noch etwas erledigen ..."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne secoue la tête en signe de dénégation.{/n} « Il a fait tout ce qu'il a pu, mais il est impossible d'extraire ces immondices drukharis inconnues tant que nous sommes sur le terrain. Nous devrons tenir jusqu'à notre retour à bord du vaisseau amiral. Il n'y a rien d'autre à faire. Je ne sais pas si nous nous en sortirons, mais si ce n'est pas le cas, il me reste une chose à faire... »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne shakes his head.{/n} "He has already done all he can, but there is no way to extract some unknown Drukhari filth out of Glaito while we're in the field. We will have to get by until we are back on the flagship, and that's that. I don't know if we will make it out of here, but in case we don't, there is something I must do..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne secoue la tête en signe de dénégation.{/n} « Il a fait tout ce qu'il a pu, mais il est impossible d'extraire ces immondices drukharis inconnues tant que nous sommes sur le terrain. Nous devrons tenir jusqu'à notre retour à bord du vaisseau amiral. Il n'y a rien d'autre à faire. Je ne sais pas si nous nous en sortirons, mais si ce n'est pas le cas, il me reste une chose à faire... »

languages.text: {n}Solomorne menea la cabeza.{/n} «Ha hecho todo lo que está en su mano, pero no existe manera de sacarle esa basura Drukhari a Glaito con los recursos de los que disponemos aquí. Tendremos que apañarnos hasta volver a la nave insignia, no queda otra. Ignoro si saldremos de aquí con vida, pero por si no lo logramos, hay algo que debo hacer...».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne shakes his head.{/n} "He has already done all he can, but there is no way to extract some unknown Drukhari filth out of Glaito while we're in the field. We will have to get by until we are back on the flagship, and that's that. I don't know if we will make it out of here, but in case we don't, there is something I must do..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne menea la cabeza.{/n} «Ha hecho todo lo que está en su mano, pero no existe manera de sacarle esa basura Drukhari a Glaito con los recursos de los que disponemos aquí. Tendremos que apañarnos hasta volver a la nave insignia, no queda otra. Ignoro si saldremos de aquí con vida, pero por si no lo logramos, hay algo que debo hacer...».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙摇了摇头。{/n}“他已经尽他所能帮忙了，但我们目前不在旗舰上，没办法把黑暗灵族那些未知的秽物从格雷托体内取出来。我们必须想办法撑下去，回到旗舰，就是这样。我不知道我们到底能不能逃得出去，但如果逃不出去的话，那有件事情我非做不可……”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne shakes his head.{/n} "He has already done all he can, but there is no way to extract some unknown Drukhari filth out of Glaito while we're in the field. We will have to get by until we are back on the flagship, and that's that. I don't know if we will make it out of here, but in case we don't, there is something I must do..."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙摇了摇头。{/n}“他已经尽他所能帮忙了，但我们目前不在旗舰上，没办法把黑暗灵族那些未知的秽物从格雷托体内取出来。我们必须想办法撑下去，回到旗舰，就是这样。我不知道我们到底能不能逃得出去，但如果逃不出去的话，那有件事情我非做不可……”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne başını sallıyor.{/n} "Zaten elinden geleni yaptı ama sahadayken Glaito'nun içinden bilinmeyen bir Drukhari pisliğini çıkarmanın yolu yok. Sancak gemisine dönene kadar idare etmek zorundayız, bu kadar. Buradan çıkıp çıkamayacağımızı bilmiyorum ancak çıkamadığımız takdirde bir şey yapmam gerekecek..."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne shakes his head.{/n} "He has already done all he can, but there is no way to extract some unknown Drukhari filth out of Glaito while we're in the field. We will have to get by until we are back on the flagship, and that's that. I don't know if we will make it out of here, but in case we don't, there is something I must do..."
